name: Monitoring Reports
description: A web application for organizing land conservation monitoring photos and reports.

ORGANIZATION_NAME.description: Your organization's name. This will show up in a few different places throughout the application.

TIME_ZONE.description: The time zone you want dates and times to show up in. Choose from 'Eastern Time (US & Canada)', 'Central Time (US & Canada)', 'Mountain Time (US & Canada)', or 'Pacific Time (US & Canada)'.

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Google Client ID for configuring Google Sign-In.

GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Google Client secret for configuring Google Sign-In.

ROLLBAR_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Optional. Only necessary if using Rollbar service for tracking application errors.

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A value will automatically be generated for you and does not need to be adjusted.

LANG.description: The default value is suitable if English is your primary language.

RAILS_MAX_THREADS.description: The default value is suitable for the free Heroku database.
